text: "Say Goodbye to Hollywood" is a 1976 song by Billy Joel and taken from his fourth studio Turnstiles and from his live album Songs in the Attic. It went to number 46 in Australia in 1976 and number 17 in the United States and number 27 in Canada. It was covered by Bette Midler in 1977. Category:1976 songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Bette Midler songs
title: Say Goodbye to Hollywood
